body_html: @F3PiX we are grabbing the email addresses from GitHub — unfortunately, since some people have set their email address to private, GH doesn't allow us to access these email addresses directly, which causes the whole problem we have with email addresses missing currently ;)
body_text: @F3PiX we are grabbing the email addresses from GitHub — unfortunately, since some people have set their email address to private, GH doesn't allow us to access these email addresses directly, which causes the whole problem we have with email addresses missing currently ;)
body: @F3PiX we are grabbing the email addresses from GitHub — unfortunately, since some people have set their email address to private, GH doesn't allow us to access these email addresses directly, which causes the whole problem we have with email addresses missing currently ;)
